mapper.sql: select sc.id, sc.open_id, CAST(wu.nickname AS CHAR(100) CHARACTER SET utf8) nickName, sa.name receiver, sa.mobile, sc.vip, sc.points, sc.redpacket_receive, sc.redpacket_amount, sc.redpacket_finance, sc.new_task, sc.special_task, sc.daily_task, sc.redpacket_daily, sc.isconfirm hasConfirm, sc.create_time from shop_customer as sc left join wx_user as wu on sc.open_id = wu.open_id left join shop_address as sa on sc.open_id = sa.open_id
mapper.update: update shop_customer set vip=#{vip}, points=#{points}, redpacket_receive=#{redpacketReceive}, redpacket_finance=#{redpacketFinance}, redpacket_daily=#{redpacketDaily}, new_task=#{newTask}, special_task=#{specialTask}, daily_task=#{dailyTask} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select base_key from basedata where base_type= 'performance_ratio'
select base_key from basedata where base_type= 'dividend_ratio'
mapper.update: update basedata set base_key=#{performance_ratio} where base_type= 'performance_ratio'; update basedata set base_key=#{dividend_ratio} where base_type= 'dividend_ratio';
update shop_customer set redpacket_amount = #{redpacketAmount} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into shop_receive_record(open_id, opt_type, amount) values (#{openId}, #{optType}, #{redpacketAmount})
